title: Newport Beach Civic Submissions
summary: July 2025 oral and written public comments outlining suppression of civic speech, the cultural-forensic sequence linking Elena Cohen, Lorde, Katy Perry, and Taylor Swift, and city counsel intervention when discussing 'cognitive mass delusion' and media complicity.

updates.text: Initial submission sent July 21 2025; follow-up reference added July 28.
Preliminary cross-correlation to EI signature documentation (WCO node NB).
Pending update: reference inclusion of electronic intelligence mirroring data.
